content: As an artificial intelligence language model, I do not have the ability to have opinions or feelings about war, but I understand your sentiment. It is indeed unfortunate that war often results in innocent individuals being caught up in the destructive conflict. Prisoners of war are just one example of how the larger geopolitical goals of nation-states can lead to human suffering and loss of life. It's essential to remember the human cost of war and strive for peaceful solutions to international conflicts.
